title: [BUG] Random app crashes in Visual Studio .NET Framework x86 project
body:
**Description**

Random app crashes in Visual Studio .NET Framework x86 project, no error at all, app just crashes ( in both VisualStudio and runtime), only thing we can get is from Windows Log with following, and the Faulting module is :clr.dll :

If change the project compile Target Platform to Any CPU or x64, works fine, seems crash happens in x86 only.
